name: Kubotz
body:
### Présentation sommaire
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:


### Captures d'écran
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### Outils technologique de développement
#### Programmation
* IDE: IntelliJ
* Langage: Java
* Librairie: LibGDX => Dépendance Gradle
* Librairie de physique: Box2D
* Gestionnaire de vesrion Git + Github
* Tiled Map Editor
* Librairie: SpriterJava

* Entity Component System (ECS)
* Intelligence artificielle
- Behaviour Tree
- A*

#### Graphisme
* Adobe Photoshop: conception des images et _Sprites_ du jeu
* Adobe Illustrator: conception des images et _Sprites_ du jeu
* Spriter: Animation des _Sprites_

#### Musique et bande sonore
* Guitar Pro 6: composition
* FL Studio: rendu + conception sonore

### Temps investi

### Contact
jwilliam.perreault@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
